item.title: Talks & Workshops
item.description: Here some of the talks and workshops I gave in the past. All slides, additional resources and some other talks are available at https://github.com/alexhermida/talks

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m √Ålex, a Software Engineer from Spain. Nowdays I work helping to find new treatments for rare diseases at Healx an AI-driven company based in Cambridge. Previously, I worked in Taiga.io, I founded Initios, a software company, and co-founded Parkapp among other things. I had a wide experience in I.T projects and I’m also a computer security enthusiast. I like to work as team facilitator and I think that the most valuable thing for achieving the goals is communication.
